title: Centripetal acceleration of moon around planet

content.question: A moon of mass <math alttext="1 times 10 to the power 20, kilograms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>20</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kg</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is in a circular orbit around a planet. The planet exerts a gravitational force of <math alttext="2 times 10 to the power 21, newtons" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>21</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>N</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> on the moon. The centripetal acceleration of the moon is most nearly

choices.label: <math alttext="0.05 meter per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mn>0.05</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="10 meters per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mn>10</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="20 meters per second squared " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>20</mn><mtext> </mtext><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 times 10 to the power 41, meters per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>41</mn></mrow></msup><mtext> </mtext><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mover><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="20 meters per second squared " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>20</mn><mtext> </mtext><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
